Report.Query: select area_code AS AreaCode, org_group_id AS OrgGroupID, org_group AS OrgGroup, run_date AS RunDate, route_id AS RouteID, route_grade AS RouteGrade, dep_interval_failed AS DepIntervalFailed, total_dep AS TotalDepTimes, pass_flag AS PassFlag, working_day_flag AS WorkingDayFlag from rpt_svcquality_depinterval where run_date>=to_date(:p_start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') and run_date<=to_date(:p_end_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')
